name: Niock-Niock
description:
Help Niock-Niock as he tries to find a way through his lover's heart, no matter the price!
On his way to find true love, he'll encounter a bunch of super cool characters, but he'll also need to live with the fact that his choices have consequences...

A game I made with to test my text engine and inventory system. 

FEATURES

  • Crappiest pixel-art you've seen!
  • A sloppy collision system!
  • An exchange quest similar to the one in Link's Awakening!
  • A dude made of corn!
  • Astonishing ending!
  • Sound effects!
  • Creepy surprises!

WARNING!

This game has content that may be disturbing to some audience (some people may die in this game, but that's not all). Keep in mind that the choices made by Niock-Niock are not mines, but rather a silly take on the absurd sh*t guys can do to get a girl's attention.
